010package imagingbook.pub.color.image;
011
012public interface ChromaticAdaptation {
013
014        // actual transformation of color coordinates.
015        // XYZ1 are interpreted relative to white point W1.
016        // Returns a new color adapted to white point W2.
017        public float[] applyTo(float[] XYZ1);
018
019}
